issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Remove use of threads and channels from ParquetScanExec
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9708](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9708). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the time I implemented the parquet scan exec I thought it was necessary to run in a thread and use channels to communicate but this can be avoided in conjunction with other changes in the parent issue.
